scripts.text: IF OBJECT_ID('silver.vehicle') IS NOT NULL DROP EXTERNAL TABLE silver.vehicle;

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE silver.vehicle
     WITH (
        DATA_SOURCE = electric_vehicle_src,
        LOCATION = 'silver/vehicle',   
        FILE_FORMAT = parquet_file_format
    )
    AS
    SELECT vehicleId as vehicle_id, vin,
            modelYear as model_year, make, model, 
            electricRange as electric_range, 
            baseMSRP as base_msrp, 
            vehicheTypeId as vehicle_type_id, 
            cafvEligibilityId as cafvEligibility_id,  
            CAST(
                SUBSTRING(
                    vehicleLocation,
                    CHARINDEX(' ', vehicleLocation) + 2,
                    CHARINDEX(' ', vehicleLocation, CHARINDEX(' ', vehicleLocation) +1) - CHARINDEX(' ', vehicleLocation) -1
                ) AS FLOAT
            ) AS longitude,
            CAST(
                SUBSTRING(
                    vehicleLocation,
                    CHARINDEX(' ', vehicleLocation, CHARINDEX(' ', vehicleLocation) +1) +1,
                    LEN(vehicleLocation) - CHARINDEX(' ', vehicleLocation, CHARINDEX(' ', vehicleLocation) +1) -1
                ) AS FLOAT
            ) AS latitude
        FROM bronze.vehicle;
